post_title: FS: Common T206 Graded 3 or higher
post_content:
I have the following T206 cards for sale:

Bill Bergen(Batting)SGC 3$115
Bob Bescher (Hands in Air)   SGC 3$85 SOLD
Al Bridwell(Portrait, No Cap)   SGC 3$100
Howie Camnitz (Arms Folded)    SGC 3.5$140
Ed HahnSGC 3$100
George SchirmSGC 3$85 SOLD
Bud SharpeSGC 4.5$130 (Nice centering)

All prices include shipping.

I recently upgraded my PC to all 4 or better. I'm selling my duplicates here and on the FB T206 group over the next few days. I have over several graded T206 cards available. I'll be listing them here, but email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] if you'd like a list.

If you want to purchase any cards:
1. Email me at [url]jcotgreave@gmail.com[/url] and let me know which card(s) you want.
2. PayPal - FF is preferred.
3. Cards will be shipped within 2 business days.
I've done several deals with Jim, buying and selling.  He is top-notch, fair, and a good guy.  Good luck with the sales!

Thanks Jim! Let me know where to send that $20...

[quote name="parkerj33" post=2527548]I've done several deals with Jim, buying and selling.  He is top-notch, fair, and a good guy.  Good luck with the sales![/QUOTE]
Jim has been great in offering advice and helping me and my son build our Monster set - deal with confidence
